DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Efficacy Safety oral intake Naftopidil 75mg daily improve clearance ureteral renal stone .
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , Single-center , Double blind , Randomized control trial Treatment - Oral Naftopidil 75 mg daily give patient schedule shockwave lithotripsy ( ESWL ) ureteral renal stone . Follow Assessments include X-ray ( KUB ) , visual analogue pain scale , do 2 , 4 , 6 week ESWL .
DOC.criteria: Radioopaque ( identifiable KUB ) ureter kidney calculus size criterion 5mm 15mm Symptomatic acute urinary tract infection runin period severe hydronephrosis 2 urinary stone Radiolucent ( nonvisible KUB ) stone recent intervention urinary stone within 6 month Patients ureteral stent 2.0 mg/dl serum creatinine level severe hepatic dysfunction orthostatic hypotension current usage alphaadrenergic blocker calcium channel blocker Pregnant nursing woman Age 15 year severe uncontrolled medical condition
